movie_title: There Are Thousands of Alien Empires in The Milky Way
introduction: Go to https://ground.news/nutshell to get 40% off unlimited access to Ground News so you can compare

vocabulary.definition: to engage in thought or reflection; meditate
vocabulary.example: Scientists speculate about the existence of alien civilizations in the Milky Way.

vocabulary.definition: to transform a planet to resemble Earth, making it habitable for humans
vocabulary.example: If humanity had the resources, Mars and Venus could be terraformed for colonization.

vocabulary.definition: relating to or involving the deliberate killing of a large group of people
vocabulary.example: Interstellar war, if it happens, would likely be genocidal in nature.

vocabulary.definition: able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions
vocabulary.example: Colonies on new planets need to be resilient to survive in harsh environments.

vocabulary.definition: enormously large or extensive; relating to astronomy
vocabulary.example: The distances between stars in the Milky Way are astronomical.

vocabulary.definition: to give a misleading or false account or impression of
vocabulary.example: Some news media outlets have a habit of distorting reality to attract attention.
